action.message: Analyze test coverage: 1) Run pytest with coverage (--cov=bestehorn_llmmanager --cov-report=term-missing --cov-fail-under=80) 2) If below 80%, identify uncovered code 3) Generate tests for uncovered critical paths 4) Repeat until coverage target met. Focus on src/bestehorn_llmmanager/ excluding _version.py.
